Savage Attacks Tips & Notes

Savage attacks only adds one of the weapons damage die, for example a great sword with 2d6 damage will only benefit from +1d6 bonus damage. So when a character with savage attacks critically hits with a great sword weapon, the damage will be 4d6 (2d6 + 1d6 critical + 1d6 savage attacks) not tripled (6d6) like the wording of the ability would suggest.
